posts.title: Ganzorig Batnasan
posts.text: My name is Ganzorig Batnasan (Ganzo), and I am a graduate student at United Arab Emirates University. My research interests are mainly in the areas of computer vision and deep learning. I got my bachelor degree in Electrical Engineering from Mongolian University of Science and Technology. During my bachelor study I studied control system design and reinforcement learning methods and image processing techniques.
